verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son לְחָכְמָתִ֣י <WH2451> unto my wisdom הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה <WH7181> attend לִ֝תְבוּנָתִ֗י <WH8394> to my understanding הַט־ <WH5186> [and] bow אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH241> thine ear
לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> That thou mayest regard מְזִמּ֑וֹת <WH4209> discretion וְ֝דַ֗עַת <WH1847> knowledge שְׂפָתֶ֥יךָ <WH8193> and [that] thy lips יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> may keep

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נֹ֣פֶת <WH5317> [as] an honeycomb תִּ֭טֹּפְנָה <WH5197> drop שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> For the lips זָרָ֑ה <WH2114> of a strange woman וְחָלָ֖ק <WH2509> [is] smoother מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> than oil חִכָּֽהּ׃ <WH2441> and her mouth
וְֽ֭אַחֲרִיתָהּ <WH319> But her end מָרָ֣ה <WH4751> is bitter כַֽלַּעֲנָ֑ה <WH3939> as wormwood חַ֝דָּ֗ה <WH2299> sharp כְּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> sword פִּיּֽוֹת׃ <WH6310> as a twoedged
רַ֭גְלֶיהָ <WH7272> Her feet יֹרְד֣וֹת <WH3381> go down מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> to death שְׁ֝א֗וֹל <WH7585> on hell צְעָדֶ֥יהָ <WH6806> her steps יִתְמֹֽכוּ׃ <WH8551> take hold

אֹ֣רַח <WH734> the path חַ֭יִּים <WH2416> of life פֶּן־ <WH6435> does not תְּפַלֵּ֑ס <WH6424> Lest thou shouldest ponder נָע֥וּ <WH5128> are moveable מַ֝עְגְּלֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH4570> her ways לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not תֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> [that] thou canst not know פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now בָ֭נִים <WH1121> me now therefore O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear לִ֑י וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֝ס֗וּרוּ <WH5493> and depart מֵאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> not from the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth

הַרְחֵ֣ק <WH7368> far מֵעָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> and דַרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> thy way וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝קְרַ֗ב <WH7126> from her and come not nigh אֶל־ <WH413> about פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> the door בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <WH1004> of her house
פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Lest thou give לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <WH312> unto others הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <WH1935> thine honour וּ֝שְׁנֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH8141> and thy years לְאַכְזָרִֽי׃ <WH394> unto the cruel

פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> lest יִשְׂבְּע֣וּ <WH7646> be filled זָרִ֣ים <WH2114> Lest strangers כֹּחֶ֑ךָ <WH3581> with thy wealth וַ֝עֲצָבֶ֗יךָ <WH6089> and thy labours בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> [be] in the house נָכְרִֽי׃ <WH5237> of a stranger
וְנָהַמְתָּ֥ <WH5098> And thou mourn בְאַחֲרִיתֶ֑ךָ <WH319> at the last בִּכְל֥וֹת <WH3615> are consumed בְּ֝שָׂרְךָ֗ <WH1320> when thy flesh וּשְׁאֵרֶֽךָ׃ <WH7607> and thy body

וְֽאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> And say אֵ֭יךְ <WH349> How שָׂנֵ֣אתִי <WH8130> How have I hated מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> instruction וְ֝תוֹכַ֗חַת <WH8433> reproof נָאַ֥ץ <WH5006> despised לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> and my heart

וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor שָׁ֭מַעְתִּי <WH8085> And have not obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice מוֹרָ֑י <WH3384> of my teachers וְ֝לִֽמְלַמְּדַ֗י <WH3925> to them that instructed לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor הִטִּ֥יתִי <WH5186> nor inclined אָזְנִֽי׃ <WH241> mine ear

כִּ֭מְעַט <WH4592> I was almost הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> become בְכָל־ <WH3605> utter רָ֑ע <WH7451> in all evil בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst קָהָ֣ל <WH6951> of the congregation וְעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> and assembly
שְׁתֵה־ <WH8354> Drink מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters מִבּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <WH953> out of thine own cistern וְ֝נֹזְלִ֗ים <WH5140> and running waters מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of בְּאֵרֶֽךָ׃ <WH875> thine own well
יָפ֣וּצוּ <WH6327> be dispersed מַעְיְנֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH4599> Let thy fountains ח֑וּצָה <WH2351> abroad בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת <WH7339> in the streets פַּלְגֵי־ <WH6388> [and] rivers מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of waters
יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לְךָ֥ לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <WH905> alone וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> else לְזָרִ֣ים <WH2114> Let them be only thine own and not strangers' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for
יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> Let מְקוֹרְךָ֥ <WH4726> Let thy fountain בָר֑וּךְ <WH1288> be blessed וּ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <WH8055> and rejoice מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> with the wife נְעוּרֶֽךָ׃ <WH5271> of thy youth

אַיֶּ֥לֶת <WH365> hind אֲהָבִ֗ים <WH158> [Let her be as] the loving וְֽיַעֲלַ֫ת־ <WH3280> roe חֵ֥ן <WH2580> and pleasant דַּ֭דֶּיהָ <WH1717> let her breasts יְרַוֻּ֣ךָ <WH7301> satisfy בְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֑ת <WH6256> thee at all times בְּ֝אַהֲבָתָ֗הּ <WH160> with her love תִּשְׁגֶּ֥ה <WH7686> and be thou ravished תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> always

וְלָ֤מָּה <WH4100> why תִשְׁגֶּ֣ה <WH7686> be ravished בְנִ֣י <WH1121> And why wilt thou my son בְזָרָ֑ה <WH2114> with a strange woman וּ֝תְחַבֵּ֗ק <WH2263> and embrace חֵ֣ק <WH2436> the bosom נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> alien

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נֹ֨כַח ׀ <WH5227> [are] before עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> the eyes יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> For the ways אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of man וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all מַעְגְּלֹתָ֥יו <WH4570> all his goings מְפַלֵּֽס׃ <WH6424> and he pondereth

עַֽווֹנוֹתָ֗יו <WH5771> His own iniquities יִלְכְּדֻנ֥וֹ <WH3920> shall take אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> the wicked וּבְחַבְלֵ֥י <WH8551> himself and he shall be holden חַ֝טָּאת֗וֹ <WH2403> of his sins יִתָּמֵֽךְ׃ <WH2256> with the cords

ה֗וּא <WH1931> He יָ֭מוּת <WH4191> He shall die בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> lack מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> without instruction וּבְרֹ֖ב <WH7230> and in the greatness אִוַּלְתּ֣וֹ <WH200> of his folly יִשְׁגֶּֽה׃ <WH7686> he shall go astray פ
